com.nwawsoft.util.tools

Class ScreenshotRobot

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nwawsoft.util.tools.ScreenshotRobot

  • public class ScreenshotRobot
extends java.lang.Object
    Screenshots all monitors or a specified monitor or area/region.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ScreenshotRobot()
      Initializes a ScreenshotRobot.

      • ScreenshotRobot

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init()
        (Re-)Initializes the ScreenshotRobot.

      • configureArea

        public void configureArea(int screen)
        Sets the Rectangle "area" depending on which monitor is specified.
        Parameters:
        screen - 0 for all monitors, else monitor number starting with 1 for main monitor.

      • setAreaManually

        public void setAreaManually(java.awt.Rectangle area)
        Sets area to the specified Rectangle.
        Parameters:
        area - any area within the screen size.

      • setAreaManually

        public void setAreaManually(int x,
                            int y,
                            int width,
                            int height)
        Sets area to the specified position and size.
        Parameters:
        x - the upper left x position of the new screen area.
        y - the upper left y position of the new screen area.
        width - the width of the new screen area.
        height - the height of the new screen area.

      • createBufferedImage

        public void createBufferedImage()
        Creates a BufferedImage of the Rectangle "area" and stores it into "bi".

      • save

        public void save(java.io.File f)
        Saves the current content of bi into the passed File in .png format. It is recommended to save into %project_root%/data to guarantee the directory exists.
        Parameters:
        f - the fie to store to.

      • getMonitors

        public java.awt.GraphicsDevice[] getMonitors()
